    • Method Detail

      • fill

        public static <ValueType,DirectionType extends DiscreteDirection,CoordinateType extends DiscreteCoordinate<CoordinateType,DirectionType>> void fill(DiscreteGrid<ValueType,DirectionType,CoordinateType> grid,
                                                                                                                                                    CoordinateType pourPosition,
                                                                                                                                                    java.util.function.Predicate<ValueType> wallPredicate,
                                                                                                                                                    java.util.function.Consumer<CoordinateType> replacementConsumer,
                                                                                                                                                    java.util.function.Predicate<ValueType> recurrencePredicate)
        Applies the FloodFill algorithm to the grid and modifies it.
        Type Parameters:
        ValueType - The kind of value.
        DirectionType - The kind of directions.
        CoordinateType - The kind of coordinates.
        Parameters:
        grid - The grid to be modified.
        pourPosition - The initial position for the pour to start.
        wallPredicate - The predicate, returning true if the value shall be considered as a wall.
        replacementConsumer - The modification that should be made to valid values.
        recurrencePredicate - The predicate, returning true if the modifications for the replacement have already been applied.
